title: DC07
provenance: Purchased new by donor Paul Thompson in New York in 2002, the year Dyson cleaners were introduced in the U.S.
description: Upright vacuum cleaner: metalic gray, yellow, and clear housing leading up to handle, with cavities for tools (brushes, tubes); front dominated by motor and collection bin assembly of yellow and clear plastic; at bottom, wide, low cleaning head with brush in front, two wheels in back, yellow at joints and adjustment points.
name: Vacuum cleaner
